settings.text: MIXING AND MASTERING SAMPLES

settings.content:
Get a mix that sounds like it belongs on the charts.
At ErgonLiplap, we don’t just polish your sound — we elevate it to industry level. Your track will hit harder, shine brighter, and grab your listeners from the first second. Radio-ready. Playlist-worthy. Artist-approved.
Hear the difference for yourself — check out our before & after examples below.

settings.liquid: OUR RELEASES

settings.custom_html:
LISTEN TO OUR

PLAYLIST!

settings.text: ErgonLiplap isn’t just an online mixing and mastering studio — we become part of your team.

settings.content: And when you win — we win with you.We work closely with every artist to craft a world-class sound that helps them reach their goals, stand out, and win. And when you win — we win with you.

At ErgonLiplap, we don’t just mix your track — we bring it to life.

Our goal is to help artists get clean, powerful, and professional sound that stands out.
With years of experience and trusted engineers, we’ll make your music clear, balanced, and ready to be heard and loved.

settings.text: COMPANIES OUR ENGINEERS HAVE WORKED WITH

settings.content: We provide professional online mixing and mastering services made for artists who care about how their music sounds. Our experienced engineers have worked with major companies in the music industry, bringing a high level of expertise to every project. Whether you're just starting out or building your catalog, we’re here to help your music sound cleaner, louder, and more impactful. Your sound deserves attention — and we’re here to make sure it gets it.

settings.title: Read Our Reviews On Social Media And Follow Us
settings.subtitle: OVER 15,000 FOLLOWERS ON SOCIAL MEDIA CAN'T BE WRONG

settings.title: Try 30s Mix for Free
settings.content: Not sure if we're the right fit? Try before you commit. We'll mix and master a 30-second section of your track — completely free, no strings attached. If you love the result, we’ll move forward with the full song. No risk, just real results.

settings.title: Unlimited Revisions Until It’s Perfect
settings.content: We keep tweaking your track until it sounds exactly how you want — no extra fees, no limits. Every revision is crafted with care to match your vision. We aim for a final mix that feels finished, polished, and ready for release.

settings.title: Unlimited stems at a flat rate
settings.content: We don’t charge extra based on the number of stems you send. Whether it’s 10 or 100 tracks, the price stays the same. This gives you the freedom to separate every element for the best possible mix. Our engineers handle complex sessions with precision and care. Just focus on your creativity — we’ll handle the rest.

settings.title: 86% of Artists Come Back
settings.content: Our clients keep coming back — not by chance, but because they trust our results. With each mix or master, we deliver clarity, impact, and consistency. That’s why 86% of artists choose to work with us again on future projects.

settings.title: No Presets. Only Custom Mixing
settings.content: Every song is unique — and your mix should be too. At ErgonLiplap, we never use cookie-cutter presets. Instead, we craft each mix and master from scratch to match your style, your emotion, and your vision. This is real custom audio work, tailored just for your sound.

settings.title: Your Track, Ready in 1–3 Days
settings.content: We know deadlines matter. That’s why we deliver a fully mixed and mastered track within 1 to 3 business days — no delays, no excuses. Fast turnaround, without sacrificing quality.

settings.title: Engineers with 10+ Years of Experience
settings.content: At ErgonLiplap, your music is in the hands of seasoned professionals. Our team includes multiple engineers — each with over a decade of experience — who specialize in different genres including hip-hop, pop, R&B, EDM, trap, indie, and more. They’ve worked with both major-label and independent artists, bringing a deep understanding of how to get the best out of every track.

settings.title: We store your projects for 6 months
settings.content: After your final payment, we securely store all your project files for up to 6 months — so you can always come back for tweaks, alternative versions, or future releases. No need to worry about losing files or backups — we’ve got your sessions covered.

settings.title: 24/7 support at every step
settings.content: We stay connected throughout your entire journey — from first message to final master. Whether you need quick edits, feedback, or just peace of mind, we’re here for you around the clock.

settings.question: How do I place an order for mixing and mastering?
settings.answer:
• Choose the service you need
  • Fill out a short form and include a link to your stems or song, or email them to us
  • Let us know any specific notes or preferences for your mix
  • Complete your order at checkout
    Once payment is made, your track will be delivered within 1–3 days and sent to your email
    If you don’t see the message, make sure to check your SPAM folder

settings.question: How to Get a Free 30-Second Demo (+$29 added to final price if you proceed)
settings.answer:
• Select the Free Demo package
  • Fill out a short form and include a link to your stems or song, or send them to our email
  • Share any notes or preferences you have for the mix
  • Hit Submit and we’ll take care of the rest
  • Wait 5–7 days to receive your 30-second demo

We create free demos within 5–7 days, as priority is given to artists who pay upfront.

Once the demo is ready, we’ll send it to your email.

If you don’t see the message, make sure to check your SPAM folder

If you don’t like it – no worries, just forget about it.

If you love it – pay the full amount, and we’ll send you the complete track.

⚠️ PLEASE NOTE:

  • The demo is stored in our system for 24 hours only after delivery. If you like it, be sure to make payment within that time to receive the full track.
  • If you decide to move forward with the full project after hearing the demo, an additional $29 will be added to the total cost. This covers the risk and time we invest by working before payment.

settings.question: When Do I Pay?
settings.answer:
If you choose the free 30 second demo mix you only pay after you hear it

Once we send the 30 second preview and you like what you hear you’ll have 24 hours to complete the payment

After that we’ll deliver the full mix straight to your email.

settings.question: What file format for is best mixing & mastering?
settings.answer: Any file you have will work, but ideally, please send: WAV file or AIFF at 24 bit - Keep sample rate the same as your project, or what you recorded the audio in. Sample rates could be 44.1khz, 88.2khz, 96khz or 192khz.

settings.question: What Is Mixing?
settings.answer:
Mixing is the process of taking all the different parts of a song — vocals, instruments, drums, background sounds — and blending them into one clean, professional-sounding track. The goal is to make sure everything sounds balanced, clear, and works together as one cohesive piece.

Volume Balancing: Making sure no sound is too loud or too quiet — everything sits right in the mix.
Panning: Placing sounds in the stereo space (left, right, center) to create width and depth.
EQ (Equalization): Shaping each sound by boosting or cutting certain frequencies to make things sound cleaner and more polished.
Compression & Limiting: Controlling dynamics so the mix sounds tight and consistent, without anything jumping out or getting buried.
Effects: Adding reverb, delay, and other effects to bring life, space, and emotion to the track.

At the end of the day, mixing is about bringing the artist’s vision to life — making sure every sound supports the song and delivers the impact it’s meant to. A skilled mix engineer knows how to turn raw stems into something powerful, emotional, and ready for release.

settings.question: What Is Mastering?
settings.answer:
Once your mix is finalized, mastering is the final step before release

The goal of mastering is to make sure your track sounds polished, loud, and consistent across all platforms — from phones and laptops to car speakers and club systems

During mastering, we process the full track (the master bus) using tools like

– EQ

– Compression

– Limiting

– Saturation

– Stereo widening

– De-essing

– And other fine-tuning techniques

A professional mastering engineer adds the final touch — making your song sound wider, cleaner, and more controlled

It’s all about making sure your track plays back perfectly no matter where it’s heard

settings.question: What are “stems”?
settings.answer:
Stems are the individual parts of your song separated into their own audio tracks.

For example: kick, snare, bass, piano, lead vocal, background vocals, and so on.

settings.question: Can I Send a Demo Mix?
settings.answer: Absolutely — it’s super helpful! It gives us a clear sense of the sound you’re aiming for, including levels, effects, and overall feel.

settings.question: Is it okay to send a reference track?
settings.answer: Feel free to send us a song that matches the vibe you're going for — it helps us dial in your sound. Don’t have one? No problem, we’ll find something that fits your style.

settings.question: How Many Tweaks Can I Request?
settings.answer: You get unlimited revisions until you're 100% satisfied with your project.

settings.question: What Kind of Music Do You Specialize In?
settings.answer:
We work with all genres. Depending on your project, we’ll assign it to an engineer who specializes in that specific style of music.

We regularly handle:

Hip-Hop, Trap, R&B, Pop, Rock, EDM, House, Techno, Reggaeton, Afrobeat, Drill, Indie, Acoustic, Soul, Jazz — and more.

settings.question: Got Multiple Tracks? We’ve Got Deals.
settings.answer: Absolutely — we offer discounts for bulk orders. The more songs you send, the bigger the discount. You can always message us in the chat or on social media to get the most up-to-date pricing.

settings.question: What If I Send The Wrong Stems?
settings.answer:
No worries just reach out to us by email and we’ll swap the files

Just make sure to contact us as soon as possible so we can use the correct stems before the engineer starts working

If the mix has already started and new stems mean starting over there may be an extra charge.

settings.question: What Will I Receive Back?
settings.answer:
Stereo mixes are returned in the following formats, if you require any others, please let us know: 

  • 96kHz 24bit wav

settings.question: Where is your team located?
settings.answer: Our engineers are based in different countries around the world. This gives us a unique edge — we bring together diverse influences, time zones, and creative perspectives to deliver a truly global sound. It also allows us to stay responsive around the clock and adapt to any artist’s style, no matter where you’re from.

settings.question: Need More Info? Just Reach Out.
settings.answer:
Of course! You can always contact us through Live Chat on our website, or reach us directly here:

📧 Email: support@ergonspace.com.

📘 Facebook: ErgonLiplap

📸 Instagram: @ergonliplap

💬 WhatsApp: ErgonLiplap

settings.text: OUR SOCIAL MEDIA
How ErgonLiplap Online Mixing & Mastering Studio Works

settings.content:
At ErgonLiplap we turn raw recordings into professional release-ready tracks—all fully online
There’s no need to step into a studio
We make the entire process fast affordable and top-quality
Whether you're working from a home setup or a pro studio we’re here to take your sound to the next level

settings.text: What Our Mixing and Mastering Engineers Do

settings.content:
Before your vocals begin listeners hear the sound—and that sound creates the first impression
Our engineers make sure it hits the right way
We carefully shape the acoustic space of your track placing each instrument where it belongs adjusting EQ compression depth and focus
We bring out the emotional core of your music and build a full modern competitive mix that connects
Every detail matters and we mix with intent—so your track doesn’t just sound good it feels right

What We Use

Alongside industry-standard DAWs we use high-end analog gear to add warmth width and character to your sound
Our engineers are highly experienced and up to date with the latest trends and technical standards in today’s music industry

Our Process

1. Record your song — ideally with separate tracks for vocals drums instruments etc
2. Export stems from your DAW in uncompressed format WAV or AIFF organize them into a folder and zip the folder
3. Send us your files via Google Drive Dropbox or email
4. Include reference materials — such as a rough mix a favorite song or notes about the sound you're going for
5. We mix and master your track based on your input and professional standards
6 Review your mix — request revisions if needed
7. Get your final release-ready track — perfect for Spotify Apple Music YouTube radio and more

Why Artists Choose ErgonLiplap

Professional chart-ready sound
Quick turnaround and fair pricing
Real engineers not preset templates
Personalized artist-first approach
